price: 8. Mpe kanisa nkombo ya Nkolo nayo mpe mipesa naye.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
